part_of_speech.name: adverb
part_of_speech.title: Adverb
part_of_speech.function: Describes a verb, adjective, or adverb.

part_of_speech.name: preposition
part_of_speech.title: Preposition
part_of_speech.function: Links a noun to another word.

part_of_speech.name: interjection
part_of_speech.title: Interjection
part_of_speech.function: Short exclamation, sometimes inserted intoa sentence.
